divs: Sighting Detailswent outside around 545 am to have a smoke looked up to see how clear the morning sky was when I seen an amber orange object flying slowly over land heading towards the ocean there was no sound no flashing beacon lights like planes have,I live under a flight path so I see planes flying over every day and this was not a plane and not the first time I have seen this type of object,sighting lasted over 2 mins untill it flew silently out of site out over the ocean .
trends: There has been one other sighting in Glace Bay
There were no other sightings in Glace Bay on or around September 19th 2012
Summary: bright orange object flying slowly heading towards the ocean no sound
